name: untiring
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
If someone has untiring energy, interest, or enthusiasm, their energy, interest, or enthusiasm never becomes weaker: We'd like to thank George for his untiring efforts on our behalf. Synonyms
indefatigable formal
tireless
unflagging

Add to word list
Add to word list
(esp. of qualities such as energy, interest, and enthusiasm) never weakening: Without Tony’s untiring enthusiasm, this campaign would not have succeeded.
